title: FUCKING PIECE OF SHIT SERVERS,
body:
FUCKING DONE WITH THIS PIECE OF SHIT GAME, WISH I NEVER PLAYED AND WISH I NEVER PUT IN , BEEN PLAYING SINCE 2010 AND THE LAG HAS BEEN BAD FOR THE PAST 3 YRS YOU FUCKING THIEVING PIECES OF SHIT I WANT A FUCKING REFUND YOU LAZY FUCKING RATS, GET OFF YOUR ASS'S AND FIX THE FUCKING SERVERS AND IAM PRETTY SURE THOSE HACKS AT WHAT EVER FUCKING EVENT YOU MOTHER FUCKERS HOLD ARE JUST FUCKING STUNTS, LRN2 FUCKING FIX YOUR SHIT. JUST HAD ANOTHER SHITTY GAME WHERE WE HAD IT IN THE BAG BUT LOST DUE TO ME DIEING ALOT WITH MY MS JUMPING TO SEVERAL HUNDRED TO A FEW FUCKING THOUSAND IAM ACTUALLY GONNA UNINSTALL AND NEVER COME BACK NOT TILL I READ IT IN THE FUCKING NEWS LEAGUE OF LEGENDS DOES NOT LAG, FYI I LIVE IN WASHING FUCKING TON STATE YOU DIPSHITS AND ITS BEEN THIS WAY WITH THE FUCKING LAG FOR YRS NOW. SO FUCK YOU AND YOUR SHIT CROOKED LAZY ASS COMPANY TOO FUCKING BAD THE CHINESE DIDNT KNOW HOW BAD YOURE AT MAINTAINING SHIT SERVERS.
ON ANOTHER NOTE, TOO BAD I WASTED A FEW HRS OF LIFE PLAYING THIS GAME AND SINCE YOU STARTED THE FUCKING TOURNEYS AND SHIT THE GAME WENT TO SHIT AND YOU ONLY PAY ATTENTION THE "PROS" SO FUCKING OFF AND DONT EXPECT ME TO EVEN FUCKING RESPOND TO YOUR FUCKING POST EITHER.
